title: Go Interfaces Tutorial
description: This lab is about interfaces in Golang. Interfaces are named collections of method signatures.

meta.title: Go Interfaces Tutorial: Implement Interfaces in Golang
meta.description: Learn how to implement interfaces in Go, including creating custom geometry interfaces, and using a generic measure function.
meta.keywords: interfaces, geometry, go, golang, go labs, go playground online, programming, go lab, go practice
